Description: Rim and body sherd of North Ionian pottery rosette bowl; pale brown clay with some silver mica; interior glazed with worn added red and white bands; exterior: top of rim glazed; rosette above two thin bands below; inscribed on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 313)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 669, no. 274)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.849)
